title: Short-term Intensive Course for Online Coach Developer Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic coaching theory and practical experience
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment, operated with a focus on formative assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the four stages of the online coaching development process: learner analysis, instructional model selection, technology solution selection, and content development
Learners can design online coaching scenarios applicable to elementary education settings
Learners can produce mobile-friendly learning materials implementable in limited technology environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
